config.shutter.title: Shutter Configuration
config.shutter.tooltip.pathSettings: Settings regarding the Camera Path Visualization.
config.shutter.tooltip.nodeTransparency: Set the transparency of Path Nodes.
config.shutter.tooltip.showDirectionalBe: Set whether or not to render a additional line with Path Nodes, indicating direction.
config.shutter.tooltip.pathStyle: Set the style in which the path between nodes is rendered during visualization.
